jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)非常卖力地；极强烈地

lj.lj_ly: she's working like stink to get everything ready.
lj.lj_ls: 她正在非常卖力地工作，以使一切都准备就绪。

phrase.cizu_name: make a stink 或 raise a stink &I{【俚语】}

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English stincan, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch and German stinken, also to stench

entry.tran: 发出恶臭;散发难闻气味
entry.def: To stink means to smell extremely unpleasant.

example.ex: Get away from me —your breath stinks...
The place stinks of fried onions...
example.tran: 这个地方有股煎洋葱的刺鼻气味。

entry.tran: 令人讨厌;让人反感;让人感觉糟糕
entry.def: If you say that something stinks, you mean that you disapprove of it because it involves ideas, feelings, or practices that you do not like.

example.tran: 我认为他们的方法糟透了。

example.ex: The whole thing stinks of political corruption.
example.tran: 整件事情都透着政治腐败的气息。

entry.tran: (引人注意的)发怒，大吵大闹，泄愤
entry.def: If someone makes a stink about something they are angry about, they show their anger in order to make people take notice.

example.ex: The family's making a hell of a stink...
The tabloid press kicked up a stink about his seven-day visit.
example.tran: 小报的报道引起民众对他为期 7 天的访问的强烈不满。

means.word_mean: 1. a distinctive odor that is offensively unpleasant
1. be extremely bad in quality or in one's performance;

list.explanation: 令人厌恶的，令人反感的

example.en: The idea of eating dog meat is holy stink to him.

auth_sentence.content: It smells out there, a rank bachelor-pad stink.
auth_sentence.res_content: It smells out there, a rank bachelor-pad stink.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It smells out there, a rank bachelor-pad stink.

auth_sentence.content: I could smell the nighttime stink of the river.
auth_sentence.res_content: I could smell the nighttime stink of the river.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I could smell the nighttime stink of the river.

auth_sentence.content: Our judgements stink in the nostrils of the people.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our judgements stink in the nostrils of the people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our judgements stink in the nostrils of the people.

means.word_mean: 散发出恶臭; 发臭味

sentences.en: The place stank of decayed fish.
There's a stink of cats in here.

jushi.english: There's a stink of cats in here.
